Summary/Introduction: I'm a hardworking person who wants to work with code every day. I have 4 years of experience with Assembly level languages like STL, LAD, or FBD. I'm a self-educated Automation Engineer in a factory, to the point where I can modify and rewrite legacy programs.

Education.Thesis Topic: A spinning machine control system based on the XBC-DP4034 PLC controller

Responsibilities: Preparing software elements for translation, working with XML, HTML files.
Checking software elements after translation for integrity, fixing occurring errors.
Maintaining around 200 machines, ensuring spare parts availability.
Modifying and modernizing industrial machines or parts of them, changing old solutions to modern alternatives.
Technological analysis and setting up machines to meet production goals.
Rewriting programs from destroyed machines, patching up old programs from machines that were not able to meet production goals.
